artifact.content: Administrators shall create new users and associate them with Plans
New phones can be connected
Phones will be associated with users & activated
Users shall be able to call other internal phones
Users shall be able to answer a phone
Users shall be able to call outside lines through local telephone company
External users calling in will be presented with a interface to dial and connect to their required extension
Users shall be billed for each phone call at a rate determined by their selected Plan
Users shall be able to have/ access Voicemail
Persons calling shall be able to leave messages on Users Voicemail
All Dial Tones shall as closely as possible resemble external phone system
Privileged Internal users shall be able to make/participate in Conference Calls
Users can make/change the outgoing messages
Administration Login must be authenticated
Administrator can look up unused extensions
Administrator can deactivate a Telephoneat any time
Administrator can reset a phone status if phone is misbehaving
Administrator can collect a telephone's status
Administrator can set a users privileges tomake particular calls (e.g. conference, etc
Administrator can collect details on the system load at a given time
The System should prevent the Administrator from entering erroneous input
The system shall produce a digital bill which can be read by existing software every billing period
The system shall produce a letter detailinoverdue bill details
Biller can create plans detailing rate, discount period and discount rate.
Biller can change a users plan, taking effect immediately
Extensions will be 4 digits long
In order to dial to an external telephone users shall dial `9'
Phones shall be organised into subnets for organisation and routing
Phones will display the Caller's ID when the phone is ringing
System may support multiple phones to one extension. The first to answer takes the call
Emergency Numbers will be free
Only Privileged users can make Long Distance Calls
All internal calls will be billed at rate according to there plan
System must have suitable maximum number of calls at a time
System Load Counter shall be incremented after number is dialled
Phone system shall operate on VoIP Protocol over a LAN
The System shall maintain a mapping of IP addresses to Extensions
The System shall detect if a telephone is behaving incorrectly
The system shall have support for 8000 users.
The Network should aim for 99.999% uptime.
There should have no successful security breaches.
The system has a life expectancy of 10-15 years.
Installing this system will make communication easier within the organisation.
Through the installation of this system, maintenance will be localised and as a result yield a faster response time
The system must enable growth/expansion up 4 times over it's expected life
The timing it takes for the system to respond
Through imitating existing telephones, it will be easy to use.
The software could be used elsewhere with little or no modification
